name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust, scalable applications using **NodeJS**, **TypeScript**, **PostgreSQL**, and modern frameworks such as **Angular** and **NestJS**. Proven expertise in implementing Clean Code principles and Domain-Driven Design (DDD), alongside hands-on experience with testing frameworks like **Jest**. Skilled in deploying applications on **GCP** and proficient in agile methodologies, including **Shape Up**. Previously contributed to high-impact projects at leading organizations, bringing strong backend development skills and a solid foundation in financial platforms, AI/ML pipelines, and cloud-native architectures using **Python** technologies (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered fullstack applications using **NodeJS** and **TypeScript** to enhance user experience and system performance, contributing to a **30%** improvement in application load times.
Developed dynamic user interfaces with **Angular** while ensuring clean and maintainable code following **Clean Code** principles and **DDD** methodologies, improving maintainability by **40%**.
Implemented robust backend services with **NestJS** and **PostgreSQL**, successfully handling **100,000+** transaction requests per day.
Utilized **Jest** for comprehensive testing strategies, achieving over **90%** test coverage across all codebases.
Deployed applications on **GCP**, implementing CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployments and reduce time to production by **50%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve system integration challenges, ensuring application compliance with industry standards and successfully overseeing **3 major releases** per quarter.

Utilized **NodeJS** and **TypeScript** to develop scalable and efficient full-stack applications, enhancing user experience and system performance.
Implemented and maintained robust databases using **PostgreSQL**, optimizing query performance by **30%** and ensuring data integrity.
Designed and developed user interfaces with **Angular**, focusing on responsive design and accessibility compliance, achieving a **95%** user satisfaction score.
Applied principles of **Clean Code** and **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** in coding practices, resulting in maintainable and high-quality codebases across projects.
Employed **NestJS** for building efficient and reliable server-side applications, contributing to a **40%** reduction in server response times.
Developed and executed unit and integration tests using **Jest**, achieving a test coverage of **85%** across all modules to ensure software reliability.
Engaged in continuous deployment and integration processes using **GCP**, improving deployment frequency by **50%** and reducing lead time for changes to production.

Leveraged **NodeJS** and **TypeScript** to develop robust full-stack applications, enhancing productivity and code maintainability across projects.
Engineered backend services, including trade execution and account tracking, supporting seamless transactions and user management.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** to design and manage databases ensuring high availability and performance, facilitating efficient data storage for 1M+ user accounts.
Collaborated with frontend teams using **Angular** to create dynamic user interfaces, ensuring a responsive design and a smooth user experience.
Implemented effective testing strategies with **Jest**, ensuring software reliability and decreasing bugs by **25%** through rigorous development standards.
Adhered to Clean Code practices, promoting readable and maintainable code which improved team collaboration and reduced onboarding time by **30%**.
Focused on Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles for complex problem-solving, constructing features that meet user needs and business objectives.
Leveraged **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)** to enhance deployment processes, achieving 99.9% uptime and improving application resilience.
Employed Shape Up methodology for project management, ensuring clarity in project goals and deliverables, leading to timely project completions within **8-week cycles**.
